internationalizations.description:
Sparknova Pvt. Ltd is a company focused in providing comprehensive end-to-end new-generation IT systems and BPO services to the Hospitality, Logistics sectors across the globe.

I was a part of a Team that had the responsibility of developing an Employee,Attendance and Leave management system for the company.

It was intended to manage the all employees details in an organized way and make easier for the employees to apply for leaves and get approved/rejected.It was later to be integrated with Fingerprint scanner.

AGILE methodology was used and technology used was MEAN stack
